content.rendered:
High profile Independent Model escorts and call girls escorts service in The Westin Hotel Kolkata

Located in New Town, Kolkata and 5 mi away from the airport, The Westin Kolkata Rajarhat features the an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center.

The hotel has an unobstructed view of the city and guests can dine at the restaurant or enjoy a drink at the bar. Free Parking is also available.

Each room features a private bathroom equipped with a bath tub and a seating area in the room to help guests unwind after a tiring day. Additionally, the hotel also offers complimentary toiletries, hairdryer and an ironing board. To meet business needs, each room has a writing desk with stationery and ergonomic chair.

There is a 24 hours front desk at the property. The hotel also provides car rental.

The hotel is 0.6 mi from Tata Medical Center and Ecospace Business Center. The Howrah Railway Station is 12 mi away. Science City and Salt Lake Stadium are within a 10-minute drive.

Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip.

Address: International Financial Hub(CBD), CBD/2, Newtown, Kolkata, West Bengal 700156
